'''Vultur Volans''' is [[Alhaitham]]'s Constellation.

==Gameplay==
{{Constellation Table|Alhaitham}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Vultur volans'' was the ancient Roman name for the constellation now known as {{w|Aquila (constellation)|Aquila}}. The modern name of this constellation is Latin for "eagle."
